mapper.insert: MERGE INTO VISIT V USING (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') AS CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL) D ON (V.VISIT_NO = D.CURRENT_DATE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET V.VISIT_COUNT = V.VISIT_COUNT + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (VISIT_NO, VISIT_COUNT) VALUES (D.CURRENT_DATE, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(VISIT_COUNT), 'FM999,999,999') AS WEEKLY_VISIT_COUNT FROM VISIT
SELECT TO_CHAR(SUM(VISIT_COUNT), 'FM999,999,999') AS ALL_VISIT_COUNT FROM VISIT WHERE TO_DATE(VISIT_NO, 'YYMMDD') > SYSDATE-7

SELECT COMMENT_NO, WRITER, CONTENT,
CASE WHEN CURRENT_DATE - REG_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - REG_DATE) *60 *60 *24 ) || '초 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - REG_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - REG_DATE) *60 *24 ) || '분 전'
WHEN CURRENT_DATE - REG_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (CURRENT_DATE - REG_DATE) *24 ) || '시간 전'
ELSE TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
END AS "REG_DATE"
FROM "COMMENT" WHERE DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY COMMENT_NO ASC
